meta.description: Sorriso: Affordable Dental Tourism in the Balkans. Offering high-quality dental care at a fraction of the cost for patients from Europe, US, Australia, and beyond.
meta.title: Sorriso - Affordable Dental Tourism
meta.ogTitle: Sorriso - Affordable Dental Tourism in the Balkans
meta.ogDescription: Sorriso provides high-quality, affordable dental care in the Balkans for patients from Europe, the US, Australia, and beyond. Discover the benefits of dental tourism with Sorriso.

meta.twitterDescription: Discover affordable dental care in the Balkans with Sorriso. We offer high-quality treatments for patients from Europe, the US, Australia, and beyond.

contactForm.name: Name

contactSection.title: Get in Touch with Us
contactSection.subtitle: Get rid of the inconveniance. Let us help you be you.
contactSection.consultationDescription: Schedule a free consultation with our experts to discuss your needs and how we can help you achieve your goals.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionContent: Welcome to our Privacy Policy. Your privacy is critically important to us. Our privacy policy explains how we handle your personal information and data.
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectContent: We collect several types of information from and about users of our website, including:
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem1: Personal identification information (Name, email address, phone number, etc.)
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem2: Demographic information (age, gender, preferences, interests, etc.)
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem3: Technical data (IP address, browser type and version, time zone setting, etc.)
privacyPolicy.informationWeCollectItem4: Usage data (information about how you use our website, products, and services)
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationContent: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationItem1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationItem2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationItem3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
privacyPolicy.howWeUseInformationItem4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityContent: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process.
